title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not have any effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The display property should cause the item to be hidden or not displayed at all in the PDF output.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'Properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate the PDF using the new emitter.

Expected Result: The labeled item should not be displayed in the PDF.

Actual Result: The labeled item is still visible in the PDF when the 'sectionDisplay' property is set to 'none'.
